songs.lyrics:
Uttar didai chin, aaja astitwo bin
Manasik tanable bhariyera mastiska hinn
Laddai chin unko naba sisuko bhabishyalai
Danabiya puruslai afno parmeshwor banai
Mauun baschin uni afailai jiudai jalai
Samajma usko pariwarko ejjat rakhna lai
Haar raat marchin arko din bachna lai
Haschin uni pida maanama lukai
Saririk sosandle ootproot unko jindagi
Aasu matrai piyera kati po po khai sutin uni
Ashikshit ra nirdosh wu ali bhinna thiyo
Wu eek ghar grihaniya kaamle pali srimati

Aljiyekocha jivan
Mero yo duniyako dobatoma

Jiuna deuna malai

Mero ekchya ra chanama

Mero ekchya chakra baal saan ho (saan ho)
Pratisparda ko faal praand ho
Eeman yesko ejjat so eslai ejjat gar
Kosis garchan sable ma bhanchau
Pratikshya gar
Ma gauchau jivan niya yed keti ko yes cheli ko
Bhanau nari ko yes mamata ko khani ko
Tyo niswartha maya garna sikaune bani ko
Janma dina sakne naya jivan urjaki rani ko
Yeslaicha daarsa haar sadyantra rachdaicha (Ahh)
Hatyauna yesko ghar saitanko niyat prasdaicha
Bhabishya yesko kastocha, ashikshit rahecyaha
Eejat sasto sato

Plz be plus to care
Yesko maancha chanchal, hridaya bishalcha

Griyasti ko lagi laxmi yuddha ko lagu kaalcha ra
Yesko khushi ko nimikta safal yo sansarcha

Aljiyekocha jivan
Mero yo duniyako dobatoma
Jiuna deuna malai
Mero ekchya ra chanama
Aljiyekocha jivan
Mero yo duniyako dobatoma
Jiuna deuna malai
Mero ekchya ra chanama
(Ahh)

Usko maan bhitra euta aagocha
Jhan jhanai bali rakocha
Uslai matrai tahacha kati pida bhakocha
Runa chahancha tara anuharma usko hasocha
Aasu ta suke sabai khali khokro aatmacha
Bhagwan hunchan re tara saitan usko saath macha
Nehative energy chunamro samaj macha
Hamro sanskar macha
Harek jaat paat macha
Kati kura jun eejat ra laaj macha
Wucdhikardacha, sadbhab ra adarsha
Manab sabyata ra maryada matgi hasdcha
Dekhera anda biswas ra bhok ko aasthalai
Magdacha mannish yaha dhungalai haat failai
Sabai ramri hos bhani afu ra aafna lai
Feri kina satru hunchan yaha daju bhai
Jasari baachna sakchaau aafnai amalai ruwaee
Yestai parsna liyera wu basdaicha tolai
songs.title: Kohi
